name: KYC Update Scam

name: Loan Fee Advance

name: OTP Sharing Fraud

name: Job Offer Registration Scam
description: Fraudster offers high-paying job and asks for registration or training fee upfront.

name: Courier Custom Charges Scam
description: Fake courier alert claims parcel held at customs; asks for immediate payment.

name: Electricity Disconnection Threat
description: Threat that power will be cut unless bill is paid or KYC updated immediately.

name: Income Tax Refund Phishing
description: Victim told they are eligible for tax refund; scam link steals bank details.

name: Credit Limit Upgrade Scam
description: Fake bank agent asks user to install remote access apps to increase credit limit.

name: PAN Card Blocking Threat
description: Scammers claim PAN will be blocked if user doesn't verify details on scam link.

name: Online Marketplace Buyer Scam
description: Fraudster pretends to buy product and sends fake QR code for receiving payment.

name: Online Marketplace Seller Scam
description: Victim sends money to book an item but seller disappears after payment.

name: Fake Tech Support Remote Access
description: Scammer pretends to be support and asks user to download remote control software.

name: Investment Multiplying Trick
description: Victim told money will double instantly after transfer; no returns provided.

name: Fake Trading Platform
description: Users invest in crypto/forex app that shows fake profits until withdrawal is refused.

name: Fake RBI/Bank Helpline Number
description: Fake helpline number steals card details under the pretext of dispute resolution.

name: Insurance Bonus Scam
description: Caller claims you are eligible for bonus but need to pay 'activation charge' first.

name: Fake Social Media Verification
description: Victim told page will be verified only after clicking malicious link.

name: Fake Scholarship Registration Scam
description: Students asked to pay processing/registration fees for scholarship approval.

name: Fake Charity Donation Drive
description: Fraudster requests donations to fake NGOs, especially during disasters.

name: Online Gaming Reward Scam
description: Scammer promises game rewards or gems in exchange for UPI payment.

name: SIM Swap Fraud
description: Attacker convinces telecom operator to issue a SIM replacement to intercept OTPs.

name: Bank Account Upgrade Scam
description: Victim told account must be 'upgraded to premium/safe mode' via scam link.

name: Mutual Fund Redemption Scam
description: Fraudster sends link asking users to redeem mutual funds to a fake portal.

name: Fake Aviation Parcel Delivery Scam
description: Victim pays multiple charges after receiving a fake parcel claim from abroad.

name: Fake Police Legal Threat
description: Threat message claims arrest is imminent unless fine or document fee is paid.

name: Fake Dating/Matchmaking Scam
description: Scammer builds trust and then requests money citing emergencies or visa issues.

name: SIM KYC Expiry Scam
description: Victim told SIM will stop working unless KYC is updated immediately through a link.

name: Loan Approval Fee Scam
description: Loan approval message requests verification fee before disbursing loan.

name: Crypto Giveaway Scam
description: User told they will receive crypto airdrop only after paying handling charges.

name: Fake Hospital Emergency Scam
description: Someone claims a relative is hospitalized and asks for urgent money transfer.

name: AirBnB/Travel Booking Advance Scam
description: Fake host takes advance payment for vacations and blocks the victim afterwards.

name: Gift Card Claim Scam
description: Victim told they have won a gift and only need to pay 'delivery charges'.

name: Fake Subscription Cancellation Scam
description: User told subscription renewal will be charged unless they click a scam link.

name: Remote Job Payroll Scam
description: Scammer promises salaried WFH role but demands laptop/security deposit upfront.

name: WhatsApp Impersonation Fraud
description: Attacker creates fake WhatsApp account pretending to be a known person and asks for money.
